snippet.title: Quadroids - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Quadroids is a mind-twisting pixel-art strategy puzzle platformer that disrupts the genre with a major twist. Players get to clear 100+ hazard-filled interconnected levels by coordinating their minions simultaneously across four screens.

Wishlist now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2419690/Quadroids/

More info: https://www.justforgames.com/quadroids

Coming on PC & Consoles in 2023.

Follow Quadroids on social media:
https://twitter.com/quadroids
https://discord.gg/VzVaAaPfnV

Follow Just For Games on social media:
